channel.title: Yell command

item.title: Yell command
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

What’s wrong with this code?

String[][] yellTitle = { {"Player","<col=-1>"}, {"Moderator","<col=5445>"}, {"Admin","<shad=4324>"}, {"Owner","<shad=0xFFFF33>"}, {"Donator","<col=4564>"} }; if(playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) { c.getPA().messageToAll("[" + yellTitle[1] +"" + yellTitle[c.playerRights] + "]</col></shad> <col=0x00009C>" + c.playerName + ": " + playerCommand.substring(5)); } }
When I yell it says "Ljava.langString.@randomnumbers
I’ve had this problem before, but I don’t remember how to fix it >_<

Read full topic
